name: Calendar Building Blocks
description:
Calendar Building Blocks is a component library of calendar elements based on the Gregorian calendar, with days of the week beginning on Sunday. Use it to build weekly, monthly, yearly calendars for user interfaces or even personal planners.


This was built to explore a few of the capabilities of Figmaâ€™s components and variants. Not all possible scenarios have been covered, but any suggestions & tips to improve this are welcome! Thanks for checking it out!


Please let me know if you've used it in a project!
